alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 1:22PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Yalobusha and eastern Tallahatchie Counties through 200 PM CST... At 122 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Minter City, or 15 miles east of Ruleville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Paynes, Scobey, Oakland, Glendora, Distall, Leverett, Cascilla, Tippo, Effie, Tillatoba and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Mississippi.
